abstract: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has lost a senior banker in Asia and a former Merrill banker has joined Stifel Nicolaus, as the game of musical chairs among the investment banks continues.
snippet: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has lost a senior banker in Asia and a former Merrill banker has joined Stifel Nicolaus, as the game of musical chairs among the investment banks continues.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has lost a senior banker in Asia and a former Merrill banker has joined Stifel, Nicolaus & Company, as the game of musical chairs among the investment banks continues.

headline.main: New Hires at Morgan Stanley and Stifel Nicolaus
